abilities.title: Reluctant Digger
abilities.description: Hob-Goblins can dig crude, shallow tunnels but hate doing so. Base Skill: 20% +5% per level of experience. Nightvision 40 ft (12.2 m), excellent day vision (human norm).

abilities.title: Crude Builder
abilities.description: Hob-Goblins construct simple, crude underground structures and can locate/deactivate traps when cautious. Base Skill: 5% +5% per level of experience; trap detection/deactivation at half skill level.

abilities.title: Keen Hearing
abilities.description: Hob-Goblins have hearing as keen as a dogâ€™s, reducing penalties when blinded by half (e.g., dodge, attack by sound). Base Direction Skill underground: 10% +5% per level (no surface structure judgment).

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 to initiative, +1 to dodge, +1 to save vs faerie magic, +1 to save vs psionic attack, +2 to save vs possession, +2 to save vs horror factor.
